name: Mahjong Classic Matching Game
description:
Mahjong Solitaire is one of the most popular games in the world. Train your brain and became smarter just playing the game!
Mahjong rules are very simple: find and match pairs of identical tiles. Match all tiles to complete a board.

Features:

• 500 Hand-Made Levels!
• NO IAP, NO Paygates. NO Story!
• Different boards from easy to challenging
• Zen gameplay
• Easy controls
• Optimized for retina and liquid retina devices
• Fastest Loading
• Free Hint
• Auto-fit
• No IAP

Enjoy! Have fun!
